skills.name: GUIDE
desc: • Deal physical damage to a single target.
• 35% Chance to Heal up to 3 allies for 15% of your MAX HP.

skills.name: DETOUR
desc: • Gain Reflect Shield for entire battle.
• Reflect Shield reduces damage by 50% and reflects a percentage of damage taken back as true damage to all enemies.

skills.name: BLOCK
desc: • Takes the damage for any ally below 50% HP or any attack that would reduce an ally below 50% HP..
